info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 8:25PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN FULTON... NORTHERN FULTON...SOUTHERN HERKIMER...WESTERN SCHENECTADY...AND MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. This band of heavy snow is producing extremely snow at the rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 825 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near St. Johnsville to near Pattersonville-Rotterdam Junction and moving southeast at 15 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Hagaman around 830 PM EST. Duanesburg around 840 PM EST. Canajoharie around 900 PM EST. Gloversville, Johnstown and Fonda around 915 PM EST. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 27 and 29A. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
